Class RepController

Object
UserController
RepController
public class RepController extends UserController
Controller for company representatives. Acts as a middle layer between the UI and the service layer, allowing representatives to create, view, and manage internship opportunities and applications.

  • Constructor Details

    • RepController

      public RepController(AuthenticationService auth, IRepository repository, RequestService requestService, CompanyRep rep, InternshipService internshipService, ApplicationService applicationService)
      Constructs a representative controller bound to a specific company representative.
      Parameters:
      auth - authentication service for login verification
      repository - shared repository for data persistence
      requestService - shared request service for handling requests
      rep - the company representative associated with this controller
      internshipService - shared service for managing internships
      applicationService - shared service for managing applications

  • Method Details

    • launch

      public void launch(SystemController systemController)
      create nw RepMenuUI and launch its Menu

    • createInternship

      public void createInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajors, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int numOfSlots) throws MaxExceedException, ObjectAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new internship opportunity on behalf of the company representative.
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      description - internship description
      level - required internship level (Basic / Intermediate / Advanced)
      preferredMajors - comma-separated preferred majors or "Any"
      openingDate - date when applications open
      closingDate - date when applications close
      numOfSlots - number of available slots (1â€“10)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the representative has reached the internship limit
      IllegalArgumentException - if any provided field is invalid
      MaxExceedException
      ObjectAlreadyExistsException

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(String internshipId, boolean visibility)
      Updates the visibility of an internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - unique ID of the internship
      visibility - true to make visible, false to hide
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to this representative or internship status is pending
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship ID is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if visibility cannot be changed due to current state

    • getPendApplications

      public List<Application> getPendApplications(String internshipId)
      Retrieves all pending applications for a given internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - unique ID of the internship
      Returns:
      list of pending Application objects
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship ID is invalid
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to this representative

      Returns:

    • approveApp

      public void approveApp(String appId) throws ObjectNotFoundException, MaxExceedException, SecurityException, IllegalStateException
      Approves an internship application.
      Parameters:
      appId - application ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application ID is invalid
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to this representative
      IllegalStateException - if the application has already been reviewed
      ObjectNotFoundException
      MaxExceedException

    • rejectApp

      public void rejectApp(String appId) throws ObjectNotFoundException, MaxExceedException
      Rejects an internship application.
      Parameters:
      appId - application ID
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the application ID is invalid
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to this representative
      IllegalStateException - if the application has already been reviewed
      MaxExceedException

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(String internshipId, String title, String description, String preferredMajors, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, Integer slot, InternshipLevel level) throws ObjectNotFoundException, SecurityException
      edit internship
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship id
      title - title
      description - description
      preferredMajors - major
      openingDate - open date
      closingDate - close date
      slot - num of slot
      level - level
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if internship not found
      SecurityException - if illegal access

      Throws:

    • parseLevel

      public InternshipLevel parseLevel(String level, boolean allowNull)
      Parses a string to an InternshipLevel enum. Checks for valid input.
      Parameters:
      level - The string representation of the internship level
      allowNull - Whether null values are allowed (for edit mode)
      Returns:
      The corresponding InternshipLevel enum
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is invalid or null

    • checkValidSlots

      public void checkValidSlots(Integer slots, boolean allowNull)
      Validates the number of slots for an internship.
      Parameters:
      slots - The number of slots to validate
      allowNull - Whether null values are allowed (for edit mode)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of slots is out of range or null when not allowed
